title: Zone Stad
resume: Zone Stad is a popular Flemish-Belgian TV series about a police-department located in Antwerp. The show started in 2003 and is still being produced. In the series, police officers solve various crimes, which are shown as realistically as possible. It is produced by the VMMa and broadcast on Belgian commercial channel vtm and TROS in The Netherlands. Currently, season 8 is being aired.
